comments.body: IIRC it's a good idea to remove the last child every time instead of the first child :+1:

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +28,32 @@    val result = callback(query).map(_.toHTML)
    resultsDiv.scrollTop = 0
    while (resultsDiv.hasChildNodes()) resultsDiv.removeChild(resultsDiv.lastChild)
    val fragment = document.createDocumentFragment()
    result.take(resultsChunkSize).foreach(fragment.appendChild)
